channel.title: Westworld on

item.author: mark@thefullertonian.com (Mark Stouffer)
item.description: You think I haven’t thought for a while already? And you have, and what you’ve come up with is that all the differences in the world are because of an entities whim? Have you ever educated children? Even for a day? And do you say to one, “ah, he has given you the gift of writing!” And to the other “oh, sorry to say he has not given you the gift.
